author: The Hated One
description:
A surveillance state that captures everything. Support my work: https://www.patreon.com/thehatedone 

There is a newly emerging industry called “whole-body” biometrics. Surveillance technologies that go beyond anything remotely imagined by sci-fi scenarios and dystopian fantasies. It is currently the primary focus of research funded by the Intelligence Advanced Research Projects Activty (IARPA) – a US government body.

IARPA aims to develop the ultimate surveillance tool – one that can combine all key biometric markers into one comprehensive surveillance AI. The research is lead by a team at the Michigan State University and the tool they are creating is called FarSight.

FarSight combines three biometric markers – gait, body and face – into a traceable profile to be matched to known individuals or to identify new matches. Gait and face recognition are not new – they are long-know methods of identifying subjects based on their stride and face. What is new is FarSight’s body recognitio
title: Total surveillance you CANNOT escape is coming
